title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, October 30, 2014
teaser: On today's show, Charlie Anderson, Vice President and Senior Research Analyst at Dougherty & Company, talks about Samsung's mobile market share and its declining profits. Then, a look at why college admission officers keep a close eye on social media. Finally, we talk about the perils of Taco Bell's new mobile ordering app.
description: On today's show, Charlie Anderson, Vice President and Senior Research Analyst at Dougherty & Company, talks about Samsung's mobile market share and its declining profits. Then, a look at why college admission officers keep a close eye on social media. Finally, we talk about the perils of Taco Bell's new mobile ordering app.
